meanings.definition: A person who boasts or brags excessively.
meanings.sent1: The gasconader at the party wouldn't stop talking about all his achievements.
meanings.sent2: She knew he was just a gasconader, always exaggerating his stories.
meanings.sent3: The gasconader claimed he could eat a hundred hot dogs in one minute, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His reputation as a gasconader spread like wildfire, earning him the nickname 'Big Talker'.
meanings.sent5: The little boy, a true gasconader, told his friends he could jump over the moon.

meanings.definition: To boast or brag in a loud or arrogant manner.
meanings.sent1: Stop gasconading about your new car; nobody likes a show-off.
meanings.sent2: He always gasconades about his accomplishments, making others feel inadequate.
meanings.sent3: The politician gasconaded about his plans to build a roller coaster in the city park.
meanings.sent4: She gasconaded so much that no one believed a word she said anymore.
meanings.sent5: The knight gasconaded before the battle, claiming he would defeat the dragon single-handedly.
